Inline stem expressions

The area of a circle is \(A = \pi r^2\) .

Einstein’s famous equation: \(E = mc^2\) .

Stem block (latexmath)

\[\sqrt{x^2 + y^2} = r\]

Stem block with title

Pythagorean Theorem
\[a^2 + b^2 = c^2\]

Multiple stem blocks

\[\frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}\]
Matrix Example
\[\begin{bmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{bmatrix}\]

AsciiMath stem blocks

Inline AsciiMath: \$sqrt(4) = 2\$

\$sum_(i=1)^n i = (n(n+1))/2\$

Mixed content with stem

Regular paragraph before.

\$\int_0^1 x^2 dx = \frac{1}{3}\$

Regular paragraph after.

Stem with escaped brackets

A matrix: \([[a,b],[c,d]]((n),(k))\)

Escaped close bracket: \(x \in [0, 1]\)

Double backslash before bracket: \(a\\)

Explicit notation macros

Using latexmath directly: \(C = \alpha + \beta Y^{\gamma} + \epsilon\)

Using asciimath directly: \$[[a,b],[c,d]]((n),(k))\$

Mixed in same document: \(x^2\) and \$sqrt(x)\$ and \(a + b\)
